A privacy policy is legally required for all websites that collect user data. It needs to include how you manage that data, store it, keep it secure, and use it.\n A complete privacy policy for websites and mobile apps is a business necessity you can’t ignore.\n How to write a privacy policy for your website depends on where your customers live and what services \n you use on your website. You can write it yourself, use a generator, or seek legal counsel. This account already exists! This mael already exists! The discount is greater than the price You must be grater than 18 years This application was created for the final project of the Smart Device Applications course Owner of this application:\n Baraa Mohammed Riffi
